5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Umm Hani’ bint Abu Talib that on the day of the Conquest (of Makkah) the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) prayed voluntary Duha with eight Rak’ah, saying the Salam after each two Rak’ah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي صَلاَةِ اللَّيْلِ وَالنَّهَارِ مَثْنَى مَثْنَى
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning (voluntary) Prayers at night and during the day are two by two
